Class Robbers

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • People
        • Criminals
          • Robbers
  • public class Robbers
extends Criminals
    Write a description of class Robbers here. Robbers walk to random houses and wait for the police to show up. They shoot the police with bullets. They have a maximum of 5 bullets per robber. Three bullets kill a policeman.
    Version:
    (April 2021)
    Author:
    (Fatima Yahya)
